block.p: YAGER-Paul, 80. Of Metuchen, NJ, August 28, 2000. Was a labor mediator for the Federal Mediation & Conciliation Service, in Washington, DC., Philadelphia, & NYC for thirty-five years, and a Navy WW II Veteran. Husband of Naomi (Rosenhaus) Yager. Father of Deborah Yager & Marion Hamermesh. Brother of Florence Levy. Grandfather of Simon and Naomi Kate Hamermesh. A memorial gathering will be held at a later date. Contributions to the Jewish Family Serivces of Middlesex County, NJ. For information, Flynn & Son Funeral Home, 23 Ford Avenue Fords, NJ.
